metadata.title: CVE-2022-29900 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: AMD microprocessor families 15h to 18h are affected by a new Spectre variant that is able to bypass their retpoline mitigation in the kernel to leak arbitrary data. An attacker with unprivileged user access can hijack return instructions to achieve arbitrary speculative code execution under certain microarchitecture-dependent conditions.

notes.note: sbeattie> RetBleed on AMD Zen 1 and Zen 2 processors
